Processing Module¶

UCS_platen_Strain(dir_path)¶

Calculate the stress based on the strain in the platens.

Parameters

dir_path (str) – path of simulation output directory

Returns

strain (%) = displacement / height of sample

Return type

list

UCS_platen_Stress(dir_path)¶

Calculate the stress based on the force in the platens.

Parameters

dir_path (str) – path of simulation output directory

Returns

stress (MPa) = force / width of sample

Return type

list

findOutputFiles(dir_path, file_extension, output_type)¶

Find ParaView output files in a given directory

Parameters

  • dir_path (str) – Directory where output files are located (full path is required)

  • file_extension (str) – File extension of output files (‘.vtu’/’.vtp’) based on Irazu/openFDEM

  • output_type (str) – Type of output files, for instance use ‘_basic_’/’_field_’ for the basic/main output files

Return list_of_files

list of output files that match the criteria

Return type

list[str]

findSubdirectories(dir_path)¶

Find all the subdirectories of a given path

Parameters

dir_path (str) – Starting directory (full path is required)

Returns

A list of subdirectories

Return type

list[str]

model_initial_info(initial_timestep)¶
Obtain information about the model, specifically

  • 2D/3D

  • Identify Irazu/openFDEM output arrays

  • Mineral phase (Mineral IDs)

  • Model/Sample dimensions

  • Type of simulation UCS/BD

Parameters

initial_timestep (str) – Reads the first time step of the simulation

Returns

rock_elem_ids_max, rock_elem_ids_min, platen_cells_elem_id, width, height

Return type

[Tuple[SupportsLessThan, SupportsLessThan, Union[None, vtkStringArray, ndarray, Type[vtkDataArray]], float, float]

numericalSort(value)¶

Strip the numerical portion of the file. Sort filenames based on natural order (e.g. 1, 2,…, 10, 11, …, instead of 1, 10, 11, 2, …)

Parameters

value (str) – Name of file

Return parts

Return the numerical portion of the file

Return type

list[str]

platen_info(pv_cells, platen_boundary_id, var_property)¶

This function thresholds cells based on boundary condition and sums them based on the defined parameter var_property

Parameters

  • pv_cells (pyvista.core.pointset.UnstructuredGrid) –

  • platen_boundary_id (float) – boundary id that the threshold should be based on

  • var_property (Dict[str, str]) – name of the property (array to b returned)

Returns

array of the property based on the threshold

Return type

ndarray

processOutputPropID(dir_path)¶

Looks for the various file extensions to decide on processing openFDEM. Currently only load BASIC/FIELD VTU/VTP files for Irazu/openFDEM

Parameters

dir_path (str) – Directory where output files are located

Returns

list of files based on the defined condition

Return type

list
